TOMAC(6D)                                             TOMAC(6D)





NAME
       tomac - convert an IRIS image to MacPaint format

SYNOPSIS
       tomac inimage.bw outimage.mac

DESCRIPTION
       tomac  converts  an  IRIS image file to a MacPaint image
       file format.

SEE ALSO
       frommac(6D)



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004                 TOMAC(6D)
